name: UpdateLandingPage
description:
Update a landing page on Mailchimp.

Use this tool to update an existing landing page on Mailchimp. Provide the necessary details for the landing page you wish to update.

parameters.name: landing_page_id
parameters.description: The unique ID for the landing page to be updated.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the page.

parameters.name: landing_page_name
parameters.description: The name for the landing page to be updated.

value_schema.description: The name of this landing page.

parameters.name: landing_page_title
parameters.description: The title displayed in the browser's title bar for the landing page.

value_schema.description: The title of this landing page seen in the browser's title bar.

parameters.name: landing_page_description
parameters.description: Provide a description for the landing page. This text summarizes the page's purpose and content.

value_schema.description: The description of this landing page.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The ID of the store associated with this landing page. It must match an existing store in the Mailchimp account.

value_schema.description: The ID of the store associated with this landing page.

parameters.name: list_id_for_landing_page
parameters.description: The ID of the list associated with this landing page.

value_schema.description: The list's ID associated with this landing page.

parameters.name: enable_tracking_with_mailchimp
parameters.description: Enable cookie tracking to monitor unique visitors and calculate conversion rates. More info: [here](https://mailchimp.com/help/use-track-mailchimp/).

value_schema.description: Use cookies to track unique visitors and calculate overall conversion rate. Learn more [here](https://mailchimp.com/help/use-track-mailchimp/).

parameters.name: enable_restricted_data_processing
parameters.description: Set to true to enable Google’s restricted data processing in compliance with the CCPA for this landing page.

value_schema.description: Google offers restricted data processing in connection with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) to restrict how Google uses certain identifiers and other data processed in the provision of its services. You can learn more about Google's restricted data processing within Google Ads [here](https://privacy.google.com/businesses/rdp/).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.description: The unique id for the page.

value_schema.description: The unique id for the page.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of this landing page.

value_schema.description: The name of this landing page.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The title of this landing page seen in the browser's title bar.

value_schema.description: The title of this landing page seen in the browser's title bar.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of this landing page.

value_schema.description: The description of this landing page.

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: The ID of the store associated with this landing page.

value_schema.description: The ID of the store associated with this landing page.

parameters.name: list_id
parameters.description: The list's ID associated with this landing page.

value_schema.description: The list's ID associated with this landing page.

parameters.name: tracking.track_with_mailchimp
parameters.description: Use cookies to track unique visitors and calculate overall conversion rate. Learn more [here](https://mailchimp.com/help/use-track-mailchimp/).

value_schema.description: Use cookies to track unique visitors and calculate overall conversion rate. Learn more [here](https://mailchimp.com/help/use-track-mailchimp/).

parameters.name: tracking.enable_restricted_data_processing
parameters.description: Google offers restricted data processing in connection with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) to restrict how Google uses certain identifiers and other data processed in the provision of its services. You can learn more about Google's restricted data processing within Google Ads [here](https://privacy.google.com/businesses/rdp/).

You can learn more about Google's restricted data processing within Google Ads [here](https://privacy.google.com/businesses/rdp/).

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
